mainSequence.step: Receptionist requests to create a booking.
UI receives the request and displays the create booking form.
Receptionist fills in the booking details.
UI sends the booking data to create a new booking.
Router forwards the booking data to the Controller.
Controller verifies room availability for the selected dates.
Repository creates a new booking in the BookingModel.
Output successful booking creation message to the Receptionist.
Output error message about room unavailability to the Receptionist.
